title: Former exec says charge will cost Twitter its magic
description: Twitter's former global communications head tells BBC News he is worried about Elon Musk's plans.

title: TikTok says staff in China can access UK and EU user data
description: The Chinese social media giant said the policy is "based on a demonstrated need to do their job".

title: China Covid: Panic and fear drove iPhone factory breakout
description: Workers at the plant in Zhengzhou, China, thought they were going to be part of a huge Covid experiment.
